title: Who Art Zou?
content: Thousands of members of [an Indian minority](http://web.archive.org/web/20090821121008/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zou_people_(India)) show up unexpectedly at Frederick & Josephine’s wedding due to careless handling of swash cap alternates in Ascender’s [May Newsletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20090821121008/http:/www.ascenderfonts.com/info/may2009-newsletter.aspx) – “Father of the bride is not amused.”
author: Florian Hardwig

comments.content: All that travel expense. What an embarrassment.
